caseTitle: Rizwan Javed & others v. Secretary Agriculture Livestock & Corporation Department KPK, Peshawar & others
tagline: The appellants who were discriminated against with respect to other similarly placed project employees are directed to be reinstated in service from the date of their termination and are also held entitled to the back benefits for the period they had worked with the project or the Provincial Government, and their service for the intervening period i.e. from the date of their termination till the date of their reinstatement is to be computed towards their pensionary benefits.
